doc.title: David Friedman: Portrait of an Exploiter
doc.plot: The life and times of extraordinary showman, director, producer and entrepreneur David Friedman, the epitome of the "exploiteer" (read it as in "privateer")as told in his own words. A one-man living history of American exploitation films from the 20s to the 70s tells it all, with incredible flair for anecdotes, chills and thrills. A companion piece to the documentary "Hollywood Rated R".
